name: CHRONO (itch)
description:
chrono is a competitive 1v1 action game where each player has the ability to slow down time for the entire system. It's extremely easy to get into and friends can hop in and play a couple quick games without committing too much time. 

requires 2 controllers to play

COOL STUFF:
-five different colored maps
-quick turnaround game time
-low skill floor, high skill ceiling
-controller support
-minimalist and clean graphics
-up to TWO players!

** LOCAL MULTIPLAYER ONLY **
